p: The acetonitrile used was LiChrosolv® hypergrade for LC-MS (Merck KGaA, Darmstadt, Germany). Analytical grade formic acid, methanol, dichloromethane, hydrochloric acid (HCl, 37%), NaOH and toluene purchased from Sigma-Aldrich (Steinheim, Germany) and ethanol (99.5%, v/v) was from Primalco (Rajamäki, Finland). Pure water obtained by an Elgastat UHQ-PS purification system (Elga, Kaarst, Germany). Gallic acid was from Sigma-Aldrich.
